attributes.additional_details:
Why how can the BBC decide to axe a programme that is informative, current, family viewing and fun. Just to be replaced with repeats that no one wants. We pay a licence fee to be able to watch new innotave and covers all age groups.
Why let the BBC be run by accounts, let the licence payers have there say.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC. It is a long-standing principle that the Government does not interfere in programme matters, either on arrangements for scheduling or on content
